title: Appaloosa Rising: Or, the Legend of the Cowboy Buddha
description: In Gino Sky's Appaloosa Rising, you will witness an authentic Western writer creating a series of erotic and improbable tall tales that read like Idaho saloon talk. If you want to absorb a vision of the west that satisfies your deepest fantasies, but doesn't offend your modern sensibilities, visit the gang at the Cowboy Buddha Hotel.
author: Gino Sky
